title: shrI lakSmIramaNa
sahitya:
shrI lakSmIramaNa paramAnanda suguNa shrtajanAvana bhavAni kAvEri madhyasthita sadana


anupallavi

  kAlakAlApta Adi kEshava dEva mahAnubhAva nIlaghana nibhatanO mAm pAhi vishAlatanO


caraNam    dIna janAbhimAna smErAnana sadAshiva kavi jIvana mAninI draupadI mAna dAna bhavAnIpura jana pOSaNa
gAnAdi sakala shAstrArtha sAra nandakumAra jAracOra shrI nArAyaNa kamalEkSaNa nityakalyANa sampUrNa janArdana
						(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
ahIsha phaNa naTana vidhinuta caraNa surEsha hita suguNa madana mOhana 
asama parAkrama dhIrOdhAra catura vara budhAsa parama shAnta guNa
